title: Voted #1 Worst Company
body: Why Riot is being voted the #1 Worst company. What the hell kind of shit is this? Never had any type of negative behavior. No reason given. No response. And of course, noreply email, and logging in is not working so I can't submit a ticket. There is literally no other way for anyone to beat out Riot Games for worst company. Absolute trash.

replies.body: It seems there's a bug that's messing with the transition from the League of Legends website (this one) to their support website (that one). The way to get around this is by signing out of this site and -then- logging in to their [Support Website](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Try doing that and you should be able to submit a ticket.

Typically if there's no reason in your reform card, it's a shield ban IE they think you've been hacked and they're protecting your account.

When you contact player support, if it's a shield ban, they're going to ask you a bunch of trivia questions about your account to verify that you are the true owner. 

Remember that you should use a strong password, including capital and lower case letters, numbers, and symbols.
